# Oni
[color=#008000]Onis are enabled for character creation.[/color]
[color=#66bbff]Onis can be achieved via the metem machine.[/color]
Onis are taller, much stronger humans with horns.
## Ability Differences
- Very strong. - Slightly less blunt damage. - Slightly less slash damage. - Slightly less piercing damage.
## Physical Differences
- Several horn markings. - Tall
